extendedIngredients.name: belgian endives
extendedIngredients.original: 2 medium Belgian endives (10 oz), sliced crosswise 1/2 inch thick

extendedIngredients.name: chicory

title: Endive and Chicory Salad with Grainy Mustard Vinaigrette
summary: Endive and Chicory Salad with Grainy Mustard Vinaigrette is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 side dish. This recipe makes 8 servings with 77 calories, 1g of protein, and 7g of fat each. For 61 cents per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. Head to the store and pick up belgian endives, pepper, salt, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 85%. This score is tremendous. Similar recipes include Potato Salad with Grainy Mustard Vinaigrette, Crisp Mackerel Salad With Grainy-mustard Vinaigrette, and Baked Chicory/Endive With Chicken in a Sage and Mustard Sauce.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Mince garlic with a large heavy knife, then mash to a paste with salt using flat side of knife.                                                                Whisk together garlic paste, mustard, vinegar, and pepper, then add oil in a slow stream, whisking until emulsified.                                                                Just before serving, toss greens with vinaigrette.                                                Cooks' notes:            路 Vinaigrette can be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered. Whisk just before using.路 Chicory can be washed and dried (but not cut or torn) 1 day ahead and chilled in sealed plastic bags lined with paper towels.

steps.step: Mince garlic with a large heavy knife, then mash to a paste with salt using flat side of knife.
Whisk together garlic paste, mustard, vinegar, and pepper, then add oil in a slow stream, whisking until emulsified.
Just before serving, toss greens with vinaigrette.
路 Vinaigrette can be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered.
Whisk just before using.路 Chicory can be washed and dried (but not cut or torn) 1 day ahead and chilled in sealed plastic bags lined with paper towels.
